ogUEhMiWPU3v.title: Content Source 2

N2ELAeSJbvSe.title: Image Width
N2ELAeSJbvSe.fieldCaption: Optionally specify the image width. Set to half the actual image size for Hi-DPI devices.

P3tx8LtTEWpe.title: Masthead Background
P3tx8LtTEWpe.fieldCaption: Background color of masthead (above the menu).

IuoxYHRewmFy.fieldCaption: Masthead background image. To override default setting with no image enter the text "none".

YnIOW0xUsMfE.title: Masthead Gradient Overlay
YnIOW0xUsMfE.fieldCaption: Top Gradient - Opacity of the gradient at the masthead top (vertical mastheads only).

XneAYnL5jWbp.fieldCaption: Bottom Gradient - Opacity of the gradient at the masthead top (vertical mastheads only).

7GXIIKSDBOyP.title: Vertical Masthead Size
7GXIIKSDBOyP.fieldCaption: Only applies to layout styles with masthead left or right.
